messages.title: FAIR IS WORTH FIGHTING FOR
messages.content: More accessible and affordable housing for local people inside the Borough. Favour local enterprises and small businesses. A fair hearing for those seeking asylum. Invest in peace. End discrimination. Tackle climate change.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: More accessible and affordable housing for local people inside the Borough.
Favour local enterprises and small businesses.
A fair hearing for those seeking asylum.

issues.economy: Favour local enterprises and small businesses.
issues.immigration: A fair hearing for those seeking asylum.

housing.content: More accessible and affordable housing for local people inside the Borough.

leaflet.personalStatement: Melan Ebrahimi-Fardouee is a senior project manager consultant in housing and regeneration. Over the past 26 years she has worked with local authorities, private sector housing developers, and social landlords in the UK. She has a good understanding of local community issues and the specific needs of tenants.

politicalExperience.role: Senior Project Manager Consultant in Housing and Regeneration
politicalExperience.achievements: Worked with local authorities, private sector housing developers, and social landlords in the UK.

images.caption: Melan assessing environmental standards on a housing project.
Vote Green for a safer, healthier future for the people of Kensington.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Printed on 100% recycled paper using sustainable technologies that do not harm the environment.
